channel.title: Is anyone nice enough to help a noob
channel.description:
so i downloaded the zenithscape client and server and i have no clue how to spawn things or level up and i dont know how to put it into the server as commands and i was also wondering how to make shops and spawn WORKING npcs
so if anyone would be nice enough to take there time and teach me i would be grateful cuse the guide on this site make no sence to me
tnk you again

item.title: Is anyone nice enough to help a noob
item.dc:creator: @dd123c5 dd123c5
item.description:
@dd123c5 wrote:

i found the shops thingy but i have no clue how to make stuff go in it and dont know how to make prices cuse it only says to put item number and quantity there are no priceses and i did get one item in and it says there aare non in stock

Read full topic
item.source: Is anyone nice enough to help a noob

item.title: Is anyone nice enough to help a noob
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.description:
@TeeBark wrote:

dd123c5:

i know but i am completely new at this and all that stuff is ether packed or hiden and i dont know how to give me self right i need someone that know somehting about zenithscape client and server or somthing like that

Go into player.java and search

Change

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("King_Zenith")) { rights = 7;

To

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("yourusername")) { rights = 7;

And then of course you can have more than one account with the same rights by adding the same piece of code again.
1 = Mod, 2 = Admin, 7 = Owner.

Read full topic
item.source: Is anyone nice enough to help a noob

item.title: Is anyone nice enough to help a noob
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.description:
@TeeBark wrote:

  1. You need to go into commands.java and give yourself the rights to use each command.
  2. To create shops; add the shop in data->items->unpackedShops . Just follow what the other shops look like:
    Shop number | shop currency | t/f boolean | Shop name | Item ID | Amount of item | Item ID | Amount of item <- Repeat.
    Then after editing/adding what you want to the shop, save, delete “packedShops.s” then re-run the server. You do not need to compile

Read full topic
item.source: Is anyone nice enough to help a noob
